mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_NM , MEMBER_GENDER , MEMBER_BIRTH , MEMBER_PHONE , MEMBER_GB , MEMBER_USE_YN FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} AND MEMBER_PWD = password(#{memberPwd})
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_MEMBER SET MEMBER_PWD = password(#{memberPwd}) ,UPD_DT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
